pullrequest.title: A bunch of new models from Cole

content.raw:
Many collada models have this problem. So it's either a bug in the collada loader or in the render engine. The normals seem to be oriented towards the negative x-axis (?) of the object so rotating the object changes the lighting of the entire model significantly and putting a light in the center of the polaris only lights the front of the model.
See https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/256/dae-file-rendering-problem and https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/266/dae-and-stl-lighting
